content.html: Great post by Brent Simmons. We're at a pivotal point in the history of the web. Its becoming clearer every day that Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, and the rest are primarily motivated by greed, and the world is taking notice.
content.value: Great post by Brent Simmons. We're at a pivotal point in the history of the web. Its becoming clearer every day that Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, and the rest are primarily motivated by greed, and the world is taking notice.
